content: triceratops dinosaur doll pattern created and written by mary r wilson - 12/01/2018 pattern is written in u s terms materials medium 4 ply yarn - red heart super saver - carrot loops & threads impeccable - royal c/ 2-2 75 mm crochet hook safety eyes - 10 mm - gold stitch marker stuffing yarn needle scissors abbreviations round - round magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet chain - chain st - stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease blo - back loops only fo - fasten_off repeat this to end of round or number of times stated bobble - bobble stitch 1 yarn over insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop yarn over pull through two loops 2 repeat number one in the same stitch three more times 3 yarn over insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop yarn over pull through all loops legs make 2 with royal round 1 - 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring = 6 st round 2 - increase = 12 st round 3 - single_crochet 1 increase = 18 st change to carrot * do not cut the royal yarn as you will need it in the next round round 4 - single_crochet 6 change to royal - bobble single_crochet 1 change to carrot - single_crochet 1 3 times single_crochet 3 = 18 st now you can cut the royal yarn and tie it off round 5 - 14 10 rnds - single_crochet each st = 18 st nd fo and weave yarn end into your work - 1st leg only * do not fasten_off the 2 leg continue on to make the body body - with carrot st round 1 - chain 1 line legs up so that the toes or bobble sts are facing forward single_crochet all 18 st of 1 leg single_crochet nd into back of chain single_crochet all 18 st of 2 leg = 38 st round 2 - increase single_crochet 9 increase single_crochet 8 increase two times single_crochet 9 = 42 st round 3 -5 3 rnds single_crochet each st = 42 st round 6 - single_crochet 5 decrease = 36 st if there is an open gap between the legs use a piece of carrot yarn to tie it closed round 7 - 10 4 rnds - single_crochet each st = 36 st round 11 - single_crochet 4 decrease = 30 st round 12 - 14 3 rnds - single_crochet each st = 30 st round 15 - single_crochet 3 decrease = 24 st start stuffing and continue to stuff to end round 16 - 18 3 rnds - single_crochet each st = 24 st round 19 - single_crochet 2 decrease = 18 st round 20 - single_crochet each st = 18 st round 21 - blo - single_crochet each st = 18 st round 22 - single_crochet 1 decrease = 12 st round 23 - decrease = 6 st fo - weave yarn end into your work head -
